title: Titanium Waraxe
summaries: The Titanium Waraxe is a Hardmode axe that is obtainable after crafting an Adamantite Forge or a Titanium Forge, and is the axe alternative to the Titanium Chainsaw. Along with it is slightly weaker alternate, the Adamantite Waraxe, it is stronger than the Mythril or Orichalcum Waraxe, making it the strongest that can be obtained before defeating the mechanical bosses. Like all other axes and chainsaws, it is solely used to cut down trees, cacti and Giant Glowing Mushrooms.
Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for this tool.

statistics.Sell: 252
